title: The Third Post
content: Here are a bunch of random words that have nothing to do with anything. If you're reading this, then you must not be paying attention to the conversation happening in class right now. I know what you're thinking. "What should I do for lunch today?" Yes, I too am getting a little hungry. I'm leaving for vacation to Hawaii in a couple of months. So I ask myself, should I go with a salad, or do I order that pizza I've been craving all weekend but couldn't get because my wife has a high sensitivity to bread products? Oh, pizza...how I've missed you.
